page.title: 11ARMED FORCES-NAVY SEA KINGS
page.content: There are four front line squadrons at Culdrose which train to do many different kinds of job.They use Mark 2 and Mark 5 Sea Kings.The Mark 2's have round radar domes on the back and Mark 3's have square domes.Some Sea Kings carry radar domes underneath them while flying.These are called AEW or Airborne Early Warning helicopters. Sea Kings are equipped to hunt submarines and attack with torpedoes and depth charges.Sea Kings have clever instruments to help them fly at night and in bad weather.820,824 and 826 squadrons wre very important in the Falklands War. Apart from anti-submarine work the Sea Kings are used for ferrying supplies to ships and for Search and Rescue.Once they have finished training at Culdrose the sqadrons go aboard Navy ships all over the world.
